description: The Ilyushin Il-10 is a propeller-driven close-support aircraft. This late variant has an improved gun armament of four 23 mm NS-23 cannons in the wings and one defensive dorsal 20 mm B-20 cannon. The NATO reporting name for the aircraft is Beast.
notes: Articulated Gun. In addition to its fixed guns, the aircraft is equipped with one dorsal 20 mm B-20 gun that can fire into the 60- arc. This gun may return fire twice per game turn in response to gun attacks or conduct one attack. The hit rolls are 3/2/1 and are modified only by the target size. The AtA damage rating is 3. The ammunition is 6.0.
